text: Yggdrasil has come to an end, but some see this as a new beginning.

subcategories.name: Attribute Allocation
subcategories.text:
Attribute values have a fixed limit of 40, which represents 400% of an average human's capabilities

Each attribute starts at 0, but leaving them there is Fatal

For reference, spellcasters only need 20 in their casting attribute to cast 10th-tier spells, provided they have enough mana and high enough caster level to qualify.

Attributes also determine your Skill potential, keep that in mind

options.label: Strength Attribute
options.description: Determines Carry Weight Limit and ability to apply Grapple, Knock Out, and Stagger

options.label: Constitution Attribute
options.description: Determines Vitality Regeneration and Damage-over-Time Resistance

options.label: Wisdom Attribute
options.description: Determines the ability to Detect Hostiles Targets and Accuracy

options.label: Charisma Attribute
options.description: Determines ability to apply and resist Mental Status Effects

subcategories.name: Race
subcategories.text:
Choose what type of race you wish to be



Racial and Job Classes grant the users a Martial Level, a Caster Level and Vitality points.

Martial Level empowers Physical Abilities, such as the use of Martial Weapons, determines your Stamina and how many Martial Skills you know

Caster Level empowers Supernatural Abilities, such as the casting of Spells, and determines your Mana Pool and how many Spells you know.

Vitality determines how much damage a character can take before dying or being knocked out.



The Energy Types are: Heat/Cold/Acid/Sonic/Electric/Light/Dark.

Many Races either have Positive% Resistances or a Negative% weakness

Having 100% Resistance means you're Immune, but only if it's gotten from Classes not equipment

Having -100% Resistance means you take double damage and are susceptible to additional effects. All Races are considered as Creatures, but

Creatures may refer to Beasts or other non-playable Races

Living races are every other race except Constructs and Undead

Constructs are Automatons and Golems

Faefolk are Fairies and Nymphs

options.label: Humanoid
options.description: The vanilla option, having little to no innate Physical or Supernatural abilities. They had no Level cost, giving more levels to Job Classes and ensuring their popularity.

options.label: Demi-Humanoids
options.description: Human-like creatures that possessed simple Physical Abilities

options.label: Heteromorphs
options.description: Inhuman creatures possessing a number of natural Physical and Supernatural abilities. They also came with prestige Racial Classes, giving more options to character creation at additional Level cost
